tags: HVAC ventilation and duct work construction service
full_summary:
# Invitation to Qualify (ITQ) for HVAC Duct Work and Ventilation Services - J.A.G. Building, P.E.I.
## ITQ Notice Details

* **Tender Reference Number**: WS4411080061, SCR4411172540
* **Original Notice Date**: January 24, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: February 8, 2024, at 14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: March 1, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: Not Specified
* **Tender Status**: Exired

## ITQ Procurement Information

* **Procurement Category**: Construction Services (CNST)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive Bidding (Invitation to Open Tender)
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

## Project Details

This ITQ is a two-phase process to procure HVAC duct work and ventilation services for the J.A.G. Building in Summerside, P.E.I. 

* **Services Required**: Supply, installation, testing, adjusting, balancing, and commissioning of new variable frequency drives (VFD) for five existing air handling units (AHU) and all necessary equipment to support these units, as per the specifications and drawings.

## Pre-Qualification Criteria

As the first phase of the ITQ process, suppliers will be evaluated based on their qualifications. The selected supplier(s) will then be invited to provide a financial bid for the second phase.

## Important Details

* The electrical contract will be awarded to the lowest bidder.
* The estimated cost of this project is between $100,001 and $500,000.

## Notice and Solicitation Information

* **Contracting Authority**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Notice and Solicitation URL**: <https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18610233>
* **Contractor Contact Information**: Timothee Beausoleil2, SPAC/PSPC <timothee.beausoleil2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca>

## Specific Requirements and Drawings

Supplier(s) must refer to the detailed specifications and drawings for the detailed requirements. 
Only suppliers who meet the pre-qualification criteria and have submitted their bids electronically on the ariba.com platform, as specified in the tender notice, will be considered for the procurement process.
